amendment.description: To clarify and expand requirements with respect to information in recall notices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4113 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4113 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1695) To clarify and expand requirements with respect to information in recall notices.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4113 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4113 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Obama.
